rukus.text: 38|65|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  tampit khnhom kreante chea anak  dasatuen promean bonnaoh .  haey kmean mcheasa na phe  sa ng del trauv  korp sakkar da pitabrakd krawpi a l laoh del chea mcheasa temuoy  kt da mha khlangokla noh laey .
38|66|trong chea mcheasa krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei haey  ning avei del nowchanloh vea teangpir .  trong mha khlangpouke  mha aphy  tosa .
38|67|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tiet tha  vea( kompir kuor an)  kuchea damnoeng( del meanobrayoch) da thomtheng
38|68|del puok anak ngeak chenhpi vea .
38|69|khnhom minban doeng ampi rueng mea la ai kat del now leumekh  khn del puokke brakekaknea( pi rueng bangkeut a da) laey .
38|70|ke min phdal vea hi aoy khnhom  krawpi aoy khnhom thveuchea anak dasatuen  promean da chbasaleasa noh laey .
38|71|( chaur changcha) nowpel del mcheasa robsa anak ban mean bantoul  towkean mea la ai kat tha  pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anakabangkeut  mnoussa ampi deisaet .

38|72|haey nowpel del yeung ban thveu aoy ke( a da) mean roub  reang penhlenh  ning ban phlom banhchoul tow knong khluon ke nouv vinhnhean robsa  yeung haey noh  chaur puok anak( mea la ai kat) saou chout champoh ke choh .
38|73|dau che  neah mea la ai kat kaban saou chout teangoasaknea .
38|74|leuklengte ai pli sabo nnaoh  del ban kraeutakratm .  haey vea ban sthet knongchamnaom puok del brachheang .

38|75|a l laoh ban mean bantoul tha  ao ai pli sa.  tae avei del reareang  anak min aoy saou chout champoh avei del yeung ban bangkeut daoy dai teangpir  robsa yeung?  tae eng kraeutakratm  ryyka eng sthet knongchamnaom anak del  mean amnuot ke  a ng kaang .
38|76|vea ban tb vinh tha  khnhom la cheangke( a da)  proh trong ban  bangkeut khnhom ampi phleung  haey trong ban bangkeut ke ampi deisaet .
38|77|haey a l laoh ban mean bantoul tha  dau che  neah  chaur eng chak  chenhpi vea( thansuokr)choh  haey pitabrakd nasa  eng kuchea anak del  trauv ke dakbandasa .
38|78|haey pitabrakd nasa  eng trauvobandasa robsa yeung rhaut  dl thngai barlok .
38|79|vea ban niyeay tha  ao mcheasa robsakhnhom.  saum ponyearpel aoy khnhom  rsa rhautadl thngai del puokke( mnoussa lok) trauv ke thveu aoy rsa laeng  vinh phng .
38|80|trong ban mean bantoul tha  dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa  anak nung  sthet knongchamnaom puok del trauv ke ponyearpel
38|81|rhautadl thngai muoy nei pelvelea del trauv ban ke kamnt .
38|82|vea ban niyeay tha  daoy pheap khpangkhpasa robsa trong  khnhom pitchea  nung thveu aoy puokke teangoasa v nge  v ng .
38|83|leuklengte banda khnhom robsa trong del mean chetd smaohtrang  knongchamnaom puokke bonnaoh .
38|84|trong ban mean bantoul tha  vea kuchea karpit .  haey yeung  bantoul nouv peakyapit tha
38|85|yeung brakadchea nung dak bampenh nork cheu han nam ampi anak eng  ning anaknea del ban daertam eng teangoasaknea knongchamnaom  puokke .
38|86|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  khnhom min snaesom pi puok anak nouv  kamrei namuoy laey  haey khnhom ka min sthet knongchamnaom anak del bradit  noh der .
38|87|vea( kompir kuor an) minmen chea avei krawpi kar romluk samreab  piphp teangoasa noh laey .
38|88|haey puok anak( puok mou sh ri ki n) pitchea nung doengpi damnoeng robsa  vea( kompir kuor an) kraoypi pelnih tow .
